summary: The Gateway Partnership Act of 2025 authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the Gateway Arch Park Foundation to host private events in Gateway Arch National Park buildings. The agreement will include terms to protect park resources, such as limiting the number of events, requiring liability insurance, and ensuring events are consistent with park purposes and don't disrupt public access. The Secretary is authorized to charge fees to cover costs and recover expenses related to the events.
